Text.Page:
Your federation begged us to join and where's it gotten us? Up to our knees in kobolds and kulkari!

If they want to convince me all this is worth it, someone ought to thin out all the {@LinkCreature:24#1#Sand Wind kobold looters}, {@LinkCreature:24#2#Sand Wind kobold lobbers}, and {@LinkCreature:24#3#Sand Wind kobold headhunters} they've attracted.
Hmph. Those damned kobolds will be back, but it's a start. Glad to see you held up your end.
